start.text: Welcome to MSCureChain! I'm your digital assistant. How can I guide you today?

explore_portals.text: MSCureChain offers several specialized gateways. Which one are you interested in?

patient_portal.text: The Patient Portal is a complete health dashboard. It features smart appointment booking, digital medical records (Lab/Imaging), and transparent billing. You login using your Mobile Number + OTP.

patient_booking.text: Our Smart Appointment Booking includes real-time doctor availability, live queue position tracking, and automatic SMS reminders.

patient_records.text: Access all your diagnostic findings, medications, and imaging reports (X-rays, MRI) in high-resolution digital format, anytime, anywhere.

doctor_terminal.text: The Doctor Terminal is a professional consultation interface. It includes intelligent queue management, AI-assisted digital prescriptions, and cross-department integration.

doctor_prescriptions.text: Our AI engine suggests medicines, checks for drug interactions/allergies, and verifies pharmacy stock in real-time.

hospital_admin.text: The Admin hub manages hospital operations, finances, and staff. It features real-time resource tracking (beds, staff) and financial governance reports.

pharmacy_lab.text: Our Pharmacy POS features digital prescription fetching and inventory alerts. The Lab module provides end-to-end sample tracking and automated report delivery.

emergency_ems.text: The Emergency module includes ambulance dispatch tracking with GPS, live trauma feeds of vitals, and trauma bed mapping.

about_system.text: MSCureChain is a modern hospital management ecosystem designed by MS Tech Hive. We focus on seamless integration, data security, and improving patient outcomes through technology.

contact_support.text: You can reach our technical support team at info@mscurechain.com or via the Helpdesk portal for internal staff.
